# core-button-group

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                         | Type                       | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------- | ----------- |
| `type`      | `type`      | The button-group type. Use: `"button"` or `"icon"`. | `"button" \| "icon"`       | `"button"`  |
| `variation` | `variation` | The button variation.                               | `"outline" \| "secondary"` | `"outline"` |
